remarks: Multiplying two transposed matrices results in the transposition of the product of the two matrices.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mattposm.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mattposm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mattposm.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` A ) $.
mattposm $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X .x. Y ) = ( tpos Y .x. tpos X ) ) $.
